SEARCH
Package gw.document

Class TemplatePluginUtils

java.lang.Object
gw.document.TemplatePluginUtils
public class TemplatePluginUtils extends Object
Class to hold a number of utility methods common to Document, Email, and Note template plugins
Author:
bjohnson

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    TemplatePluginUtils.TemplateResultBlock
    This interface is used by the resolveTemplates after the templates have been resolved, it is executed in the target locale.
    static interface 
    TemplatePluginUtils.TemplateSetupBlock
    This interface is used by the resolveTemplates to setup the IScriptHost with the symbols that are required by the templates.

  • Constructor Details

    • TemplatePluginUtils

      public TemplatePluginUtils()

  • Method Details

    • castDocumentProduction

      public static IDocumentProduction castDocumentProduction(Object obj, Class iface)
      This will cast the object to an IDocumentProduction proxy. This will accept an IGosuClassInstance or an interface that extends the iface requested or it will create a proxy for the object.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to cast to a handler
      iface - the interface that it should implement
      Returns:
      an IDocumentProduction object

    • getUrlFromPath

      public static String getUrlFromPath(String strPath, String rootPath)
      This will create a url out of a file path and a root path. It uses a simple transformation for string, it only changes spaces to the url encoded value. If there is any other encoders available use them instead.
      Parameters:
      strPath - the relative path to the file
      rootPath - the absolute path to the root
      Returns:
      a string that can be used as a url

    • match

      public static boolean match(String found, String[] expected)
      This will match that expected tokens against the found string, if the all expected words were found then the method will return true. The found string is broken into tokens on comma, whitespace is NOT ignored, case is ignored.
      Parameters:
      found - the string found
      expected - the tokens expected
      Returns:
      true if all expected tokens found

    • match

      public static boolean match(String[] found, String[] expected)
      This will match that expected tokens against the found tokens, if the all expected words were found then the method will return true. Case is ignored.
      Parameters:
      found - the tokens found
      expected - the tokens expected
      Returns:
      true if all expected tokens found

    • matchStringsEqual

      public static boolean matchStringsEqual(Object found, Object expected)
      This will match that expected tokens against the found tokens, if the all expected words were found then the method will return true. Case is ignored. This will compare with equals.
      Parameters:
      found - the tokens found
      expected - the tokens expected
      Returns:
      true if all expected tokens found

    • coerceToStringArray

      public static String[] coerceToStringArray(Object obj)
      This will ensure that the object is a string array
      Parameters:
      obj - the object
      Returns:
      the string array

    • matchStringsStartsWith

      public static boolean matchStringsStartsWith(Object found, Object expected)
      This will match that expected tokens against the found tokens, if the all expected words were found then the method will return true. Case is ignored. This will compare using starts with.
      Parameters:
      found - the tokens found
      expected - the tokens expected
      Returns:
      true if all expected tokens found

    • encodeSpaces

      public static String encodeSpaces(String strUrl)
      This is a simple transformation for string, it only changes spaces to the url encoded value. If there is any other encoders available use them instead.
      Parameters:
      strUrl - the string to escape spaces on
      Returns:
      the string with spaces escaped

    • resolveTemplates

      public static void resolveTemplates(ILocale locale, Reader[] templateSources, TemplatePluginUtils.TemplateSetupBlock setupBlock, TemplatePluginUtils.TemplateResultBlock resultBlock) throws Exception
      This will process the template in a specific locale, for each of the templates parts it will read the template part and create a reader for the output of that template part. The setup should set any symbol that will be used by these template parts.
      Parameters:
      locale - the locale to handle the response in
      templateSources - an array of Readers to process as templates
      setupBlock - the block called to initialize the script host
      resultBlock - the block called after the templateSources have been resolved
      Throws:
      Exception
